# Regularity Project Instructions

This is a Next.js 14 habit tracking application with TypeScript, TailwindCSS, and PostgreSQL integration.

## Project Structure
- Mobile-first design based on Figma mockup
- User authentication system
- Goal management with progress tracking
- Clean, modern UI with circular progress indicators

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow TailwindCSS utility-first approach
- Implement responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Use Next.js 14 App Router structure
- Connect to PostgreSQL for data persistence

## Key Features
- User registration/login with username and password
- Goal creation with daily tracking
- Progress visualization with vertical bar indicator
- Goal reset and progress functionality
- Profile management

## Copilot Instructions
- Do not write specific test scripts after a prompt
- Do not write documentation markdowns to recap changes
